author: raceQs.com

changelog.release_notes: Release to include pebble 2

NEW 	FOLLOWING LEG navigation - new screen after navigation screen with mark selection.
MOD	Prioritize Alerts
MOD	Enhance start line pinged code to create/replace navigable Start mark
MOD	VMG Smoothing - use Groove COG for TWA calculation when in groove, else use COG30 
MOD	Navigation arrow based on groove or COG30, not current COG
MOD	Navigation terminated round the mark and within 1/4 nm.
MOD	Display Distance To Mark(DTM) on navigation screen in place of VMG
FIX	crash on Stop racing option from start timer
FIX	"Select icon not showing on sub-menu from dashboard
FIX	pebble original crash on delete any mark 
FIX	"Nav. screen occasionally corrupted"
FIX	"Don't reset wind on button START as we probably won't be close hauled on stbd, like on the start line"

Fix "corruption with degree symbol	"
ADD	Capture large wind shift and prompt for acceptance
ADD	If no wind or upwind, assume stbd tack start and set the wind at the start (1st groove after)
FIX 	Exit from set wind fails to set the current window
ADD auto set wind at start - assumes upwind on starboard tack
MOD return to navigate screen after setting the next mark
FIX: "crash after 90 seconds inactivity FIX: "polars crashes when navigating" FIX: "groove crashes after 60 points" ADD: Logging when SLEEP FIX :" not uploading track file"

Big breakthrough for pebble Original users:
 1. The "Wind Shift" and "Polars" screens now available on the pebble Original series. They were released for pebble Time series and are now implemented in pebble Original and pebble Steel.
2. The 10-mark download restriction has been increased to 30 marks 
3. W/L marks will now be created even if there are marks downloaded from raceQs.
FIX: "Wind set on Port tack generates incorrect TWD"

Minor revision.
FIX: "Wind shift window displays headings in degrees True". Now displays as degrees Magnetic so you can compare with your compass.

FIX: "On a big header on an upwind leg it deduces a bear-away to a reach".Now the point of sailing is set on rounding windward or leeward mark, or when you set the wind.

FIX: "Start timer +/- doesn't display the new time when the watch is isolated from the phone". Fixed, now it does.

ADD - Wind shift screen - shows heading changes due to wind shifts. Only on pebble Time, sorry, not enough memory on the original.
ADD - we are now capturing a lot of statistics about your sessions for analysis of issues and improvements.
stability fix for pebble original

Sharp re-design of all screens for improved readability.
New status bar on all major screens showing time, status icons.
New menu from ANY of the four dashboard screens to manage race state, navigation and wind setting.
New wind detection: ditched the compass, now sail upwind in a Groove.
New Groove Analysis screen showing stable course and deviation. 
Vectors screen now scaled to speed, displays titles on data fields, re-position VMG when downwind, erase “cloud” on tack or jibe, enable display when not racing. 
Expanded options on Start Timer menu during countdown.
Upgraded event log as a link from the Settings page.
Improved algorithms for wind shift alerts, OCS alert .
Overwrites W/L Marks as new ones are created. 
Initial screen is the main menu not Start Timer.
Ability to navigate to a mark even when not racing,
New Leeward Mark rounding prompt to re-set the wind.
New “Off course” alert for long race reaching.
Stability improvements.

FIX	Useful alerts not always reported
FIX	Virtual polars displaying VMG to mark, not VMG to wind
MOD Improve algorithms for naviation alerts and displays
FIX	Virtual polars not available for pebble Original and Time

ADD	Titles for SOG, COG,  and TWD on polars screen 
MOD VMG to wind on polars screen with title
MOD increase update frequency from 2 sec's to 1 sec
ADD	Helpful messages on the navigation screen when not navigating or not racing
ADD	Alert when stopping navigation due to the VMG (course) going negative.
MOD VMG display on Nav screen is now VMG to mark
MOD	Remove VMG delta
FIX	Pinged marks not being set
NEW	Delete mark on long-click select from marks menu
FIX	memory leak from navigation screen. 
MOD "any key" to clear the alert message, not just the BACK 
ADD	Report  start times in settings page
FX	Removed "Virtual Polars" screen to get a stable version to run on pebble Original and pebble Steel models

FIX	No marks when running without internet
ADD	Start/stop racing from SELECT on SOG/COG
FIX	Settings crash if no pingedMarks

FIX	formatting of timer screen when racing. Now shows "race time:'
FIX	formatting of TWD in "perfect start"
FIX	iPhone clearing of app data at 10:00
FIX	Timer sync with phone when no GPS
FIX	Timer +/- pre-start needs BT and GPS
FIX	Flash Race/Time
FIX 	"Lost connection with phone" repeats during countdown

NEW	return to last used dashboard screen
FIX	"Crash after Tack Analysis"

MOD	Increase font on wind screen to draw your attention to getting a correct reading.
MOD	Short press UP/DOWN for +/- on timer when "starting" to increase/decrease timer by 1 minute
FIX	"On subsequent re-start of timer, the menu bar shows the reset icon, not + > -"
MOD	Take tack analysis out of notification into an alert - only 5 sec's to absorb.
FIX	"Not recording pinged marks"

MOD	Increase font on wind screen to draw your attention to getting a correct reading.
MOD	Short press UP/DOWN for +/- on timer when "starting" to increase/decrease timer by 1 minute
FIX	"On subsequent re-start of timer, the menu bar shows the reset icon, not + > -"
MOD	Take tack analysis out of notification into an alert - only 5 sec's to absorb.
FIX	"Not recording pinged marks"

MOD	Increase font on wind screen to draw your attention to getting a correct reading.
MOD	Short press UP/DOWN for +/- on timer when "starting" to increase/decrease timer by 1 minute
FIX	"On subsequent re-start of timer, the menu bar shows the reset icon, not + > -"
MOD	Take tack analysis out of notification into an alert - only 5 sec's to absorb.

MOD	Increase font on wind screen to draw your attention to getting a correct reading.
MOD	Short press UP/DOWN for +/- on timer when "starting" to increase/decrease timer by 1 minute
FIX	 "On subsequent re-start of timer, the menu bar shows the reset icon, not + > -"
MOD	Take tack analysis out of notification into an alert - only 5 sec's to absorb.

description: Free beta App marine GPS and sailboat race computer. www.raceQs.com/smartwatch
